# supabase_edge_function (Resource)

Edge Function resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "supabase_edge_function" "foo" {
  project_ref = "mayuaycdtijbctgqbycg"
  slug        = "foo"
  entrypoint  = "supabase/functions/foo/index.ts"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `entrypoint` (String) Path to the function entrypoint file
- `project_ref` (String) Project ref
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier for the function

### Optional

- `import_map` (String) Path to the import map file
- `name` (String) Name of the function (defaults to slug if not specified)
- `static_files` (List of String) List of glob patterns for static files to include

### Read-Only

- `checksum` (String) SHA256 checksum of the deployed function bundle (remote)
- `created_at` (Number) Timestamp when the function was created
- `id` (String) Function identifier
- `local_checksum` (String) SHA256 checksum of local source files before upload
- `status` (String) Function deployment status
- `updated_at` (Number) Timestamp when the function was last updated
- `version` (Number) Currently deployed function version
